gw.bc.invoice.entity

Interface InvoiceItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider, java.lang.Comparable<Bean>, Editable, EventAware, com.guidewire.pl.domain.messaging.gen.EventAwareStubI, IGosuObject, InCurrencySilo, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.InCurrencySiloStubI, com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.gen.InvoiceItemStubI, ItemState, com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.gen.ItemStateStubI, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Keyable, KeyableBean, Retireable, Reversible, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.ReversibleStubI, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Sourceable, Versionable

    public interface InvoiceItem
extends com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.gen.InvoiceItemStubI
    A single entry in the makePayment of payments for a given policy.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  InvoiceItem.HasEventDateOnOrAfterPredicate
      a predicate comparing the event date of the item to a passed in date
      static class  InvoiceItem.HasRolePredicate
      predicate that returns true if there is an item commission for the role and it has a non-zero commission amount

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayNameAsItemType

        java.lang.String getDisplayNameAsItemType()
        Equivalent to calling getDisplayName("ItemType"). Added for Gosu visibility
        Returns:
        the "ItemType" DisplayName for the invoice item.

      • getNetAmountPaidForPrimaryProducer

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountPaidForPrimaryProducer()
        Returns the Net Amount Paid on this invoice item.
        Returns:
        Net Amount Paid, which is essentially the Amount Paid - Commission Amount.

      • getNetAmountSettled

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountSettled()
        Returns:
        the net amount that has been paid, earned (made payable), and written off.

      • getNetAmountUnsettled

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountUnsettled()
        Returns:
        net amount "charged" minus net amount paid. If no money has been paid, then this is the same as getNetAmount()

      • getNetAmountUnsettledIncludingPromise

        MonetaryAmount getNetAmountUnsettledIncludingPromise()
        Returns:
        Gross unsettled amount minus unsettled commission (commission reserve across all item commissions - active or inactive - in the primary role) when you count promised gross and promised commission as settled.

      • getTotalNetAmountPaidForPrimaryProducers

        MonetaryAmount getTotalNetAmountPaidForPrimaryProducers()
        Returns:
        Returns the total Net Amount paid counting all PrimaryProducers (active and inactive) on this

      • isSettled

        boolean isSettled()
        Returns:
        true if the invoice item's gross amount settled is equal to the invoice item's gross amount AND the commission settled on this invoice item is equal to the primary commission amount of this invoice item

      • isFullyConsumed

        boolean isFullyConsumed()
        Returns:
        true if the invoice item does not have any unpaid amount and has no untaken credit. Unlike isSettled(), this method will return true on items that have been overpaid or taken too much credit.

      • isUnpaid

        boolean isUnpaid()
        Returns:
        true if the invoice item's paid amount is zero.

      • lockAsNotPaymentException

        void lockAsNotPaymentException()
        Marks the invoice item that payment exceptions should be ignored. No payment exceptions should be shown until the payment exception lock has been cleared (happens automatically when executing an agency payment item) or when the scriptable clearPaymentExceptionLock() method is called.

      • lockAsPaymentException

        void lockAsPaymentException()
        Marks that this invoice item should be a payment exception and its payment exception status should not be cleared. The invoice item should stay as a payment exception until the payment exception lock is cleared.

      • isLockedAsNotPaymentException

        boolean isLockedAsNotPaymentException()
        Returns:
        whether or not the invoice item currently has a payment exception lock of "not exception". This means we will ignore this invoice item while setting payment exceptions

      • isPaymentCarriedForward

        @Deprecated
boolean isPaymentCarriedForward()
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) use isLockedAsNotPaymentException()
        Returns:
        whether or not the invoice item currently has a payment exception lock of "not exception". This means we will ignore this invoice item while setting payment exceptions

      • getPaymentCarriedForwardDate

        @Deprecated
java.util.Date getPaymentCarriedForwardDate()
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) use InvoiceItemStubI.getPaymentExceptionLockDate()
        Returns:
        The date this invoice item last had its payment exception lock set

      • isLockedAsPaymentException

        boolean isLockedAsPaymentException()
        Returns:
        whether or not the invoice item currently has a payment exception lock of "exception". This means we will never clear this invoice item's payment exception status until the lock is cleared.

      • clearPaymentExceptionLock

        void clearPaymentExceptionLock()
        Clears the payment exception lock on this invoice item, whether it was set to 'Not Exception' (where we would never mark this invoice item as an exception) or 'Exception' (where we would never clear the exception). Clearing the lock will allow exception handling to continue normally

      • clearPaymentCarriedForward

        @Deprecated
void clearPaymentCarriedForward()
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) use clearPaymentException()

      • clearPaymentException

        void clearPaymentException()
        Un-marks this Invoice Item as no longer a payment exception.

      • markAsPaymentException

        void markAsPaymentException()
        Marks this Invoice Item as a payment exception as of today's date. This method maintains the existing exception date if one exists. To update the exception date to today's date when the item is currently an exception, first invoke clearPaymentException() before invoking this method.

      • isPaymentException

        boolean isPaymentException()
        Returns:
        true if this Invoice Item is currently marked as a payment exception. False if it is not.

      • lockAsPromiseException

        void lockAsPromiseException()
        Marks that this invoice item should be a promise exception and its promise exception status should not be cleared. The invoice item should stay as a promise exception until the promise exception lock is cleared.

      • lockAsNotPromiseException

        void lockAsNotPromiseException()
        Marks the invoice item that promise exceptions should be ignored. No promise exceptions should be shown until the promise exception lock has been cleared (happens automatically when executing an agency promise item) or when the scriptable clearPromiseExceptionLock() method is called.

      • isLockedAsNotPromiseException

        boolean isLockedAsNotPromiseException()
        Returns:
        whether or not the invoice item currently has a promise exception lock of "not exception". This means we will ignore this invoice item while setting promise exceptions

      • getPromiseCarriedForwardDate

        @Deprecated
java.util.Date getPromiseCarriedForwardDate()
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) use InvoiceItemStubI.getPromiseExceptionLockDate()
        Returns:
        The date this invoice item last had its promise exception lock set

      • isPromiseCarriedForward

        @Deprecated
boolean isPromiseCarriedForward()
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) use isLockedAsNotPromiseException()
        Returns:
        whether or not the invoice item currently has a promise exception lock of "not exception". This means we will ignore this invoice item while setting promise exceptions

      • isLockedAsPromiseException

        boolean isLockedAsPromiseException()
        Returns:
        whether or not the invoice item currently has a promise exception lock of "exception". This means we will never clear this invoice item's promise exception status until the lock is cleared.

      • clearPromiseExceptionLock

        void clearPromiseExceptionLock()
        Clears the promise exception lock on this invoice item, whether it was set to 'Not Exception' (where we would never mark this invoice item as an exception) or 'Exception' (where we would never clear the exception). Clearing the lock will allow exception handling to re-commence normally

      • clearPromiseCarriedForward

        @Deprecated
void clearPromiseCarriedForward()
        Deprecated. Since (8.0.0) use clearPromiseException()

      • clearPromiseException

        void clearPromiseException()
        Un-marks this Invoice Item as no longer a promise exception.

      • markAsPromiseException

        void markAsPromiseException()
        Marks this Invoice Item as a promise exception as of today's date. This method maintains the existing exception date if one exists. To update the exception date to today's date when the item is currently an exception, first invoke clearPromiseException() before invoking this method.

      • isPromiseException

        boolean isPromiseException()
        Returns:
        true if this Invoice Item is currently marked as a promise exception. False if it is not.

      • getTotalPaidCommissionForRole

        Returns:

      • getTotalCommissionReserveForRole

        MonetaryAmount getTotalCommissionReserveForRole(PolicyRole role)
        This returns the total CommissionAmount across all InvoiceItemPolicyCommissions with the given role (i.e. both active and inactive).
        Parameters:
        role - The role within which to search for commission
        Returns:
        Commission from CommissionAmount field minus the Commission that's been Paid. If the paid commission is zero, then this is the same as getTotalCommissionAmountForRole()

      • overrideCommissionRate

        MonetaryAmount overrideCommissionRate(PolicyRole policyRole,
                                    @Nonnull
                                    java.math.BigDecimal newCommissionRate)
        Override the commissionRate on the ItemCommission that is active on this InvoiceItem for the given role.

        Note that calling this method directly does NOT trigger a call to the ICommissionOverride.shouldCreateCommissionAdjustmentInvoiceItem(InvoiceItem, java.math.BigDecimal, java.math.BigDecimal) method. That plugin method DOES get called when a commission rate override is done by calling Charge.overrideCommissionRate(gw.bc.account.typekey.PolicyRole, java.math.BigDecimal).
        Parameters:
        policyRole - PolicyRole
        newCommissionRate - BigDecimal
        Returns:
        the amount of the adjustment caused by the rate override

      • overrideCommissionRate

        MonetaryAmount overrideCommissionRate(PolicyRole policyRole,
                                    @Nonnull
                                    java.math.BigDecimal newCommissionRate,
                                    java.math.RoundingMode roundingMode)
        Override the commissionRate on the ItemCommission that is active on this InvoiceItem for the given role.

        Note that calling this method directly does NOT trigger a call to the ICommissionOverride.shouldCreateCommissionAdjustmentInvoiceItem(InvoiceItem, java.math.BigDecimal, java.math.BigDecimal) method. That plugin method DOES get called when a commission rate override is done by calling Charge.overrideCommissionRate(gw.bc.account.typekey.PolicyRole, java.math.BigDecimal).
        Parameters:
        policyRole - PolicyRole
        newCommissionRate - BigDecimal
        roundingMode - How the commission should be rounded
        Returns:
        the amount of the adjustment caused by the rate override

      • getInvoiceItemCommissionRateOverride

        java.math.BigDecimal getInvoiceItemCommissionRateOverride(PolicyRole policyRole)
        Parameters:
        policyRole - the PolicyRole of the rate of the CommissionRateOverride to return
        Returns:
        the InvoiceItem-level overriding commission rate, else null

      • isAgencyBill

      • getTransactionsNoChargeDue

        ChargeInvoicingTxn[] getTransactionsNoChargeDue()
        Returns:
        The transactions related to this invoice item, not including any ChargeDue transactions.

        NOTE: this method uses a query to return results, and uses the not-recommended gw.api.database.IQueryBeanResult#getResultsAsList() method. This could be a performance issue if hundreds of results are returned.

      • getUnsettledCommissionIncludingPromises

      • writeOffCommissionReserve

        CommissionsReserveWriteoffTxn writeOffCommissionReserve(PolicyRole policyRole)
        Write off remaining commission reserve on the active item commission for given role on this invoice item. Does nothing if there is no reserve.
        Parameters:
        policyRole - Role of active item commission to execute write-off against.
        Returns:
        CommissionsReserveWriteoffTxn transaction that represents this commission writeoff: - CommissionsReserveNegativeWriteoffTxn if reserve was positive - CommissionsReservePositiveWriteoffTxn if reserve was negative - null if there is no reserve

      • writeOffCommission

        CommissionsReserveNegativeWriteoffTxn writeOffCommission(MonetaryAmount amount,
                                                       PolicyRole policyRole)
        Writes off commission on the active item commission for given role on this invoice item. If the write-off amount is greater than the available reserve, we will attempt to "un-earn" some payable commission.
        Parameters:
        amount - of commission to write off, which must be positive. For negative amount, use writeOffCommissionRecovery()
        policyRole - Role of active item commission to execute write-off against.
        Returns:
        CommissionsReserveNegativeWriteoffTxn transaction representing the commission writeoff.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if: - amount is negative - amount > (ItemCommission.CommissionReserve + "Adjustable Earnings") where "Adjustable Earnings" = sum of all ReserveCmsnEarned transactions earned by any Payable Criteria other than "On Payment Received."

      • writeOffCommissionRecovery

        CommissionsReservePositiveWriteoffTxn writeOffCommissionRecovery(MonetaryAmount amount,
                                                               PolicyRole policyRole)
        Writes off commission recovery on the active item commission for given role on this invoice item. (Create write-off of opposite sign as writeOffCommission.)

        If the write-off amount is less than (negative magnitude is greater than) the available reserve (should also be negative), we will attempt to "un-earn" some payable commission.

        Parameters:
        amount - of commission to recover, which must be positive. This will effectively execute a commission write-off of (0 - amount).
        policyRole - Role of active item commission to execute write-off recovery against.
        Returns:
        CommissionsReservePositiveWriteoffTxn transaction representing the commission writeoff.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if: - amount is negative - (0 - amount) < (ItemCommission.CommissionReserve + "Adjustable Earnings") where "Adjustable Earnings" = sum of all ReserveCmsnEarned transactions earned by any Payable Criteria other than "On Payment Received."

      • getInvoiceBilledDate

      • isHeldBecauseOfDelinquency

        boolean isHeldBecauseOfDelinquency()
        Returns true if this invoice item is held because of delinquency. The invoice item has to have a policy period which is delinquent, and also have the setting policyPeriod.isHoldInvoicingWhenDelinquent() resolve to true or delinquencyPlan.isHoldInvoicingOnDlnqPolicies() resolve to true.
        Returns:
        true if this item is held because of delinquency

      • getEventDateAndInvoice

        java.util.Date getEventDateAndInvoice()
        Needed to create an EventDateAndInvoice "property" so that PolicyDetailPayments doesn't need a special setter to update the invoice this invoice item is on if the event date is changed. Seems better to put this functionality in the domain methods rather than a web-specific method
        Returns:
        the event date

      • setEventDateAndInvoice

        void setEventDateAndInvoice(java.util.Date eventDate)
        Updates the event date and moves this invoice item to the proper invoice, if necessary. The "proper" invoice is defined as the invoice whose invoice date is the nearest after this invoice item's event date. Does nothing if the given event date is null.
        Parameters:
        eventDate - the date to set

      • onInvoiceBilled

        ChargeInvoicingTxn onInvoiceBilled()
        Creates the appropriate billing transaction and makes any commission earned on billing become payable. This method creates a ChargeBilled transaction. If this invoice item is already associated with a ChargeBilled transaction, then this method does nothing and returns null.
        Returns:
        the ChargeBilled transaction created

      • doDueTransaction

        ChargeDue doDueTransaction()
        If the invoice item amount is positive, this method creates a ChargeDue transaction for that amount. Otherwise, this method is a no-op and returns null. If this invoice item is already associated with a ChargeDue transaction, then this method does nothing and returns null.
        Returns:
        the ChargeDue transaction created or null

      • transferCommissionReceiver

        void transferCommissionReceiver(ProducerCode targetProducerCode,
                              PolicyRole policyRole,
                              CommissionTransferOption transferOption)
        Scriptable method for transferring the earning producer code on a single invoice item. Transfers the invoice item to earn on the given Producer Code in the given Policy Role Will do any necessary PolicyCommission, ChargeCommission and ItemCommission setup
        Parameters:
        targetProducerCode - The Producer Code to transfer this item to earn on
        policyRole - The role to transfer
        transferOption - How to do the transfer: If retroactive, we will transfer all item commissions in that role, regardless of active status, as well as reverse any appropriate payable txns and dist items. If Point in Time, will only transfer reserve from the current active item commission in that role. All Future is not a valid option for transfer on an individual invoice item

      • getPrimaryCommissionReserve

        MonetaryAmount getPrimaryCommissionReserve()
        Returns:
        The active primary commission reserve (Commission amount less the settled amount on the active primary item commission)

        Returns:

        Returns:
        true if the gross and active primary commission amounts are both positive or one is positive and the other zero.

      • isNegative

        Returns:
        true if the gross and active primary commission amounts are both negative or one is negative and the other zero.

      • isBillDatePlacement

        boolean isBillDatePlacement()
        Whether the invoice item should be placed according to the bill date of the invoice. If it is placed according to the bill date of the invoice, then it can be placed on invoices whose bill date (event date) is on or after the invoice item's event date.
        Returns:
        true if the invoice item should be placed according to the bill date of the invoice.

      • isDueDatePlacement

        boolean isDueDatePlacement()
        Whether the invoice item should be placed according to the due date of the invoice. If it is placed according to the due date of the invoice, then it can be placed on invoices whose (payment) due date is on or after the invoice item's event date.
        Returns:
        true if the invoice item should be placed according to the due date of the invoice.

      • getInvoicePlacementCutoffType

        InvoiceItemPlacementCutoffType getInvoicePlacementCutoffType()
        Whether the invoice item should be placed according to the due date of the invoice or the bill date of the invoice. See isDueDatePlacement() and isBillDatePlacement().
        Returns:
        Whether the invoice item should be placed according to the due date of the invoice or the bill date of the invoice.

        Returns:
        true if the invoice item is part of a policy period charge

      • writeOffGrossAndPrimaryUnsettledAmounts

        com.google.gdata.util.common.base.Pair<ItemGrossWriteoff,ItemCommissionWriteoff> writeOffGrossAndPrimaryUnsettledAmounts(WriteoffReason writeoffReason,
                                                                                                                       AgencyWriteoffType type,
                                                                                                                       @Nullable
                                                                                                                       AgencyPaymentItem associatedPaymentItem)
        Write Off any mismatches on this Invoice Item (either Gross or Commission) between the settled amount and the expected amount
        Parameters:
        writeoffReason - The reason for the gross writeoff
        type - The type of writeoff to do (either gross, commission, or both)
        associatedPaymentItem - Optional payment item to associate with this writeoff.
        Returns:
        The write-offs that resulted. There may be no write-offs, one commission write-offs, one gross, or both commission and gross.
